程序包 org.modelmapper

接口 Converter<S,​D>

  • 类型参数:
    S - source type
    D - destination type
    所有已知子接口:
    ConditionalConverter<S,​D>
    所有已知实现类:
    AbstractConverter, ArrayNodeToCollectionConverter, AssignableConverter, CollectionToArrayNodeConverter, CustomConversion.When_using_member_converter_for_deep_model.CustomConverter, MergingCollectionConverter, MessageToBuilderConverter, NonMergingCollectionConverter, PrimitiveJsonNodeConverter, StrongTypeConditionalConverter
    public interface Converter<S,​D>
    Converts instances of source type S to instances of destination type D.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      修饰符和类型 方法 说明
      D convert​(MappingContext<S,​D> context)
      Converts the MappingContext.getSource() to an instance of MappingContext.getDestinationType().

    • 方法详细资料

      • convert

        D convert​(MappingContext<S,​D> context)
        Converts the MappingContext.getSource() to an instance of MappingContext.getDestinationType().
        参数:
        context - of current mapping process
        抛出:
        MappingException - if an error occurs while converting
